verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to them,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2063>These<s%> are the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that are <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H6536>parts<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and is cloven <S%H8156>footed,<s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> and <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> that shall you <S%H398>eat.<s%>

<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> shall you not <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> or of them that <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof:<s%> as the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> but <S%H6536>divides<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.
And the <S%H8227>coney,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> but <S%H6536>divides<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.
And the <S%H768>hare,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> but <S%H6536>divides<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

And the <S%H2386>swine,<s%> though he <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and be cloven <S%H8156>footed,<s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> yet he <S%H1641>chews<s%> not the <S%H1625>cud;<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.
Of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall you not <S%H398>eat,<s%> and their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall you not <S%H5060>touch;<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

<S%H2088>These<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that are in the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> has <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and in the <S%H5158>rivers,<s%> them shall you <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> that have not <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and in the <S%H5158>rivers,<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8318>move<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> they shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> to you:
They shall be even an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> to you; you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> but you shall have their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> in <S%H8262>abomination.<s%>
<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5579>fins<s%> nor <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> that shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> to you.

And <S%H428>these<s%> are they which you shall have in <S%H8262>abomination<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H5775>fowls;<s%> they shall not be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> they are an <S%H8263>abomination:<s%> the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and the <S%H6538>ossifrage,<s%> and the <S%H5822>ospray,<s%>
And the <S%H1676>vulture,<s%> and the <S%H344>kite<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind;<s%>
<S%H853>Every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6158>raven<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind;<s%>
And the <S%H1323>owl,<s%> <S%H3284><s%> and the <S%H8464>night<s%> <S%H8464>hawk,<s%> and the <S%H7828>cuckoo,<s%> and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
And the <S%H3563>little<s%> <S%H3563>owl,<s%> and the <S%H7994>cormorant,<s%> and the <S%H3244>great<s%> <S%H3244>owl,<s%>
And the <S%H8580>swan,<s%> and the <S%H6893>pelican,<s%> and the <S%H7360>gier<s%> <S%H7360>eagle,<s%>
And the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> the <S%H601>heron<s%> after her <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H1744>lapwing,<s%> and the <S%H5847>bat.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> that <S%H8318>creep,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> on all <S%H702>four,<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> to you.

<S%H389>Yet<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> may you <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>flying<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> thing that <S%H1980>goes<s%> on all <S%H702>four,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3767>legs<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> to <S%H5425>leap<s%> <S%H2004>with<s%> on the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

Even <S%H428>these<s%> of them you may <S%H398>eat;<s%> the <S%H697>locust<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H5556>bald<s%> <S%H5556>locust<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H2728>beetle<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H2284>grasshopper<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind.<s%>
But <S%H3605>all<s%> other <S%H5775>flying<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> things, <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet,<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> to you.

And for <S%H428>these<s%> you shall be <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5375>bears<s%> ought of the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

The carcasses of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6536>divides<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and is not cloven <S%H8156>footed,<s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you: <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> on his <S%H3709>paws,<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H2416>beasts<s%> that <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> all <S%H702>four,<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you: <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And he that <S%H5375>bears<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even:<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

<S%H2088>These<s%> also shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you among the <S%H8318>creeping<s%> things that <S%H8317>creep<s%> on the <S%H776>earth;<s%> the <S%H2467>weasel,<s%> and the <S%H5909>mouse,<s%> and the <S%H6632>tortoise<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
And the <S%H604>ferret,<s%> and the <S%H3581>chameleon,<s%> and the <S%H3911>lizard,<s%> and the <S%H2546>snail,<s%> and the <S%H8580>mole.<s%>

<S%H2088>These<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you among <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8318>creep:<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> does <S%H5060>touch<s%> them, when they be <S%H4194>dead,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And on <S%H3605>whatever<s%> any of them, when they are <S%H4194>dead,<s%> does <S%H5307>fall,<s%> it shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> whether it be <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H899>raiment,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8242>sack,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> it be, <S%H834>wherein<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> is <S%H6213>done,<s%> it must be <S%H935>put<s%> into <S%H4325>water,<s%> and it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even;<s%> so it shall be <S%H2891>cleansed.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> into <S%H834>where<s%> any of them <S%H5307>falls,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> is in it shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> and you shall <S%H7665>break<s%> it.

Of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H400>meat<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> may be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> that <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> such <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4945>drink<s%> that may be <S%H8354>drunk<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> such <S%H3627>vessel<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> thing <S%H834>whereupon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> any part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> whether it be <S%H8574>oven,<s%> or <S%H3600>ranges<s%> for pots, they shall be <S%H5422>broken<s%> <S%H5422>down:<s%> for they are unclean <S%H2931><s%>and shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> or <S%H953>pit,<s%> wherein there is <S%H4723>plenty<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> shall be <S%H2889>clean:<s%> but that which <S%H5060>touches<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> any part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> on <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2221>sowing<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is to be <S%H2232>sown,<s%> it shall be <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H4325>water<s%> be <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and any part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> it shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

And <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H929>beast,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> you may <S%H402>eat,<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> he that <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> thereof shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And he that <S%H398>eats<s%> of the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of it shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even:<s%> he also that <S%H5375>bears<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of it shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>
And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> thing that <S%H8317>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination;<s%> it shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> on the <S%H1512>belly,<s%> and <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> on all <S%H702>four,<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> has <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> things that <S%H8317>creep<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> them you shall not <S%H398>eat;<s%> for they are an <S%H8263>abomination.<s%>

You shall not make <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H8262>abominable<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> thing that <S%H8317>creeps,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you make <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> with them, that you should be <S%H2933>defiled<s%> thereby.

For I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> you shall therefore <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> and you shall be <S%H6918>holy;<s%> for I am <S%H6918>holy:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> manner of <S%H8318>creeping<s%> thing that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H5927>brings<s%> you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be your <S%H430>God:<s%> you shall therefore be <S%H6918>holy,<s%> for I am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and of the <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H8317>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

To make a <S%H914>difference<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2416>beast<s%> that may be <S%H398>eaten<s%> and the <S%H2416>beast<s%> that may not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
